name: Je Me Souviens
description:
Je Me Souviens is a first-person narrative adventure game with a focus on language learning development. The player, having little to no prior knowledge practicing the French language, navigates their passage to the small town explores to two important places to their deceased childhood friend, Nicolás.This exploration not only strengthens the players practice in French language but strengthens their tethered bond with an old friend.

This demo teases the first level, the train station.
